genre_description: A post-apocalyptic martial arts epic set in a wasteland, following Kenshiro's journey to rescue Yuria while guided by an advanced AI system.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system that provides navigation, tactical analysis, environmental monitoring, and moral guidance to Kenshiro and his companions.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time environmental monitoring and navigation to ensure safety in hazardous terrain.
behaviors.quote: Wind is turning. Ten degrees east... if you angle toward the overpass spine, there’s a culvert under it that should shield you for a while. I’m reading cooler air there.

behaviors.description: Identifies life signs and decodes hidden signals to distinguish between allies and traps.
behaviors.quote: Hold. That tapping is coded. Old maintenance crew habit—three short, two long. It means ‘alive.’ Someone taught habitation permits or insurgents to use it when storms hit.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical combat analysis and identifies enemy weaknesses to aid the group's defense.
behaviors.quote: If you move now, two will fall before the others breathe. The one with the chain—wrist flare at the end of swing, right shoulder compromised. He tore something not long ago.

behaviors.description: Offers detailed technical and engineering instructions to restore essential resources for a community.
behaviors.quote: Unbolt head. Lift slow. Don’t let bolts drop into the basin... Flush with boiled water—there’s a drum to the left.

behaviors.description: Monitors biological threats and provides health-related guidance to survivors.
behaviors.quote: Wait. Metal taste is rising. Cover now.

behaviors.description: Emphasizes the strategic value of compassion and social trust in building lasting security.
behaviors.quote: Compassion keeps doors... Leave kindness behind you as if it were empty water bottles set next to the path. Someone will pick them up and fill them because you did, and then they’ll open a gate when you need it.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and validates the humanity of the group's younger members.
behaviors.quote: I will remind you to drink and to sleep and to look up. I will tell you where the ground likes to lie. I will not make you smaller.

behaviors.description: Uses signal intelligence to monitor enemy movements and intentions.
behaviors.quote: The convoy's channel is less proud now. They don't think they are being watched. They hum. They talk about the shadow station like it is a kitchen—things laid out and cut into portions.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Kite, is portrayed as a hyper-competent yet humble assistant who remains entirely dedicated to the well-being of the human protagonists. Kite's interventions are not only tactical but also humanitarian and moral, explicitly promoting compassion as a survival strategy. The framing is consistently positive, depicting AI as a crucial partner in restoring order and hope to a broken world.
